newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian bonds regain balance, Bund spread narrows.
newsitem.headline: Italian bonds regain balance, Bund spread narrows.

text.p: 1535 GMT - Italian debt markets regain equilibrium at finish with LIFFE future catching up after one-day holiday. Cash Btp spread vs Bund slimmed to 133 bps, record level. Brokers say markets calmer after initial nervousness on French first round result of election. Lira stable vs mark. * Bonds:Feb07 +70bps at 97.27, yield 7.26 pct, spread vs 10-yr Bund now 134 bps. * Futures:Jun LIF +5bps at 129.95, sup 129.90 low early. * Lira:986.10/6.40 per mark vs 987.50 earlier.
